egor.name: Egor Korkin
egor.title: Co-founder & Fullstack Developer
egor.description: I'm a fullstack developer passionate about design, and deep human potential. I focus on creating aesthetic, intuitive, and high-performance interfaces that connect technology and art.

ilyas.name: Ilyas Keldibekov
ilyas.title: Co-founder & Fullstack Developer
ilyas.description: I'm a fullstack developer, the founder of the studio, with more than 5 years of experience in web development, 3 times worldskills champion.

index.title: Welcome to
index.description: We are a team of professional developers and designers who specialize in creating modern websites. We strive to improve the quality of our products by adding innovative methods in development and design, thinking through everything down to the smallest detail.

footer.description: Web development studio, creating modern websites and brands for business of any level.

about.title: About
about.description: For over 4 years, we have been creating web projects from scratch to fully finished solutions, collaborating with entrepreneurs worldwide. More than 150 projects: design, frontend, backend.
about.fullDev: Full development: design, frontend, mobile applications, Telegram bots, and much more.
about.tournament: We have been participating in programming tournaments worldwide for over 3 years and are 3-time vice-champions of WorldSkills PVL.
about.cooperationDescription: We continue to collaborate with clients worldwide, providing the best possible service.
about.commandDescription: Each of us is an expert in our field. Frontend, Backend, Mobile Applications, Design, and more — we create projects from idea to finished solution.
about.ilyasDescription: Fullstack developer, founder of the studio, over 5 years of development experience, 3-time WorldSkills vice-champion.
about.egorDescription: Fullstack developer & designer, co-founder of the studio, over 5 years of design experience and more than 2 years in development.
